original: Laudon, Axel, disponent, Göteborg, f. 24/10/98 i Skälderviken, Krist. 1., av ing. Alex L. o. Amelie Eriksson. G. 28 m. Margareta Uddman. Barn: An-na-Lena f. 30, Sven Anders 32, Carin Margareta 37. — Stud:ex. i Lund 18, utex. fr. KTH (K) 23. Stud:res. t. USA, Centr :amerika o. Västindien 24-25, Tyskl. 32, Engl. o. kontinenten 38. Anst. v. Spreckels Sugar Co. i Calif., USA, 24, Cia Azucarera Ermita i Ori-ente på Kuba 25, kemist o. assist, v. Sv. Sockerfabr. A-B sockerbruk i Staffanstorp o. Hälsingborg 26-32, tekn. assist, v. bol. huvikont. i Malmö 32-35, disp. f. Tanto Sockerbruk i Sthlm 3’5-42, dito f. Gbgs Sockerbruk sed. 43. Led. av Skånska ing:kl. sed. 32, led. av Te’kn. samf., ordf. i dess avd. f. kemi o. fysik sed. 45, led. av Sv. teknrfören., Börssällsk. i Gbg o. Rotarj^kl. Skr.: Konsttorkn. av grönt foder (tills. m. andra 40), Sockertillverkning. Handbok i kem. teknologi (45), Sockerf ramställning träsocker, konsttorkning (45), ett 30-tal avh. i facktidskr. 25-46 m. m.
translated: Laudon, Axel, manager, Gothenburg, b. 24/10/98 in Skälderviken, Krist. 1., son of engineer Alex L. and Amelie Eriksson. Married on 28 with Margareta Uddman. Children: Anna-Lena b. 30, Sven Anders b. 32, Carin Margareta b. 37. — Received high school diploma in Lund in 18, graduated from KTH (K) in 23. Studied abroad in USA, Central America, and the West Indies from 24-25, Germany 32, England and the continent 38. Employed by Spreckels Sugar Co. in Calif., USA, in 24, Cia Azucarera Ermita in Oriente, Cuba in 25, chemist and assistant at Swedish Sugar Factory A-B sugar plants in Staffanstorp and Helsingborg from 26-32, technical assistant at the company's main office in Malmö from 32-35, manager for Tanto Sugar Factory in Stockholm from 35-42, and the same for Gothenburg Sugar Factory since 43. Member of the Skåne Engineering Club since 32, member of the Technical Society, chairman of its chemistry and physics department since 45, member of the Swedish Technical Association, Gothenburg Stock Exchange Society, and Rotary Club. Writings: Drying of green fodder (together with others in 40), Sugar manufacturing. Handbook of chemical technology (45), Sugar production, wood sugar, artificial drying (45), about 30 papers in professional journals from 25-46, and more.

occupation.namedPosition: Swedish Sugar Factory A-B sugar plants
